main: Learn English easily with the best methods
main_second: We combine the best methods for teaching English
first_card: Grammar, reading, listening, pronunciation tasks will help you improve your language skills.
second_card: Learn what you need, write words, and we will select tasks for them for the bestmemorization.
third_card: Listen, read, translate - one of the best methods of learning English.
fourth_card: Track progress and maintain daily activities, get rewards and medals.
footer_text: Leave notes and papers at home and study anywhere, even offline, with our iOS and Android apps. Progress is synced and stored on your phone, computer.
